title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 205.1 - Definition of mutual aid
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 205.1 - Definition of mutual aid

State Regulations

Organized, supervised, coordinated, cooperative, reciprocal
assistance in which personnel, equipment and physical facilities of fire
departments, regardless of type or size, are utilized for fire or other public
emergency in which the services of firemen would be used throughout the State
of New York and contiguous areas. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
205.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
